title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + FOI Jedi Moves Psychological approaches to get public records and increase public support for FOI
description: Strategies for journalists to effectively request public records and gain public support for Freedom of Information (FOI) using psychological approaches and principled negotiation.
